message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product at $20,000. It's a fantastic value and I think you'll be very happy with it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider letting it go for $17,000. This is a fair offer considering its quality and what it can do for you.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to offer $14,000. I think that's a fair price considering what I've seen so far.
